title: Best of The Herd: 12/24/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/24/2018
description:
Colin spreads Christmas cheer to NFL teams far and near over this Holiday season, except for the Pittsburgh Steelers who are a talented, hot mess. Russell Wilson and the Seahawks out “Mahomed” Patrick. The Cowboys proved yet again they're a great team by clinching the NFC east title and playoff berth and Baker Mayfield shows the world yet again his child like attitude. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
